ARABIC: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَٰدِقِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They say, 'When will this promise come about if you are telling the truth?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Yet they say: "When will the promised threat come to pass, if you speak the truth?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They say: "(Tell us) when will the threat of punishment come to pass if you are truthful?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They say, "When shall the Day of Judgment come to pass if you are true in your claim?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And they say, “When will this promise occur, if you are truthful?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And they say: "When will this promise (come to pass), if you are truthful."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they say: When will this threat come to pass if you are truthful?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They say, 'And when shall the promise come to pass, if you speak truly?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And they say: When will this promise (be fulfilled), if ye are truthful?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They ask, "When will this promise be fulfilled, if what you say be true?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they say: when cometh this torment if ye are truth- tellers!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And they say, ‘When will this promise be fulfilled, if you are truthful?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They say: "When will this promise come to pass, if ye are telling the truth?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And they say: "When will this promise (come to pass), if you are truthful."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They say: 'If you are truthful, when will this promise come'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And they say, “When will this promise come true, if you are truthful?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [21:38] And they say, ‘When will this promise, of resurrection, be [fulfilled], if you are truthful?’, about it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And they say) i.e. the disbelievers of Mecca: (When will this promise) that you have promised us, Muhammad, ((be fulfilled), if ye are truthful?)
